text: umber of patients (when available) Myopathy 5% Aplasia of the middle phalanx of the hand - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Brachydactyly syndrome - Clinodactyly - Dilated cardiomyopathy - Syndactyly - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percentage of patients
